definition: to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to assign/to allocate/to transfer (money to an account)
to push aside/to part/to brush away
to move to and fro (with hand, foot, stick etc)/to fiddle with/to stir up
bring order out of chaos/set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder
a drum-shaped rattle (used by peddlers or as a toy)/rattle-drum
lit. to dispel the clouds and see the sun (idiom); fig. to restore justice
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between

sentences.english: What time shall I set the alarm (clock) for?
sentences.chinese: 我该把闹钟拨到几点钟响？

sentences.english: The band started to play a 38)twangy tune.
sentences.chinese: 乐队开始弹奏一首拨弦乐。

sentences.english: Sorry, the number you dail is busy now. Please dail it again later.
sentences.chinese: 您好，您所拨打的电话正忙，请稍后再拨。

sentences.english: After that, I called Information, Please for everything.
sentences.chinese: 打那以后，我只要有事，就拨信息台。

sentences.english: She the telephone and dialed a number.
sentences.chinese: 她捡起电话并拨了一个号码。

sentences.english: Contacto - Smart Contact Management, Group Email, Photo Speed Dialer.
sentences.chinese: 智能联系管理，群组电子邮件，照片快拨。

sentences.english: You must have dial somebody else's number.
sentences.chinese: 你一定拨到别人的号码去了。

sentences.english: Variable speed lathe with a fork is the product of one of the main parts.
sentences.chinese: 车床变速用拨叉是某企业产品的主要零件之一。

sentences.english: I'm sorry. I must have misdialed.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我一定是拨错了。

sentences.english: She may also move it aside with her hand.
sentences.chinese: 也许她是用手将头发拨到一边。

sentences.english: Please dail his room number directly.
The number you have dialed is not available. Please rotate your head 90 degrees and try again.
sentences.chinese: 您刚才拨的号码是虚构的，请把脑袋转90度再拨。

sentences.english: The number you have dialed is not available. Please rotate your head 90 degrees and try again.
sentences.chinese: 您刚才拨的号码是虚构的，请把脑袋转90度再拨。

sentences.english: DDD calls . Please dial "9"first, then the area code and the telephone number .
sentences.chinese: 拨打国内长途，请先拨“9”再拨区号和电话号码。

definition: to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
to notify sb of a call/to call sb to the phone
to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
to hit/to strike/to tap/to rap/to knock/to rip sb off/to overcharge
to press down/to press a button
